answers.answer: My doctor told me that its very common to lose weight during the begining of your pregnancy. I threw up about 3 times and always had morning sickness all day like i felt like i was going to vomit but only actually got sick about 3 times and after about 18weeks it went away but i lost 5 pounds, i ate more than i did before i got pregnant and i got lazy in the beginning and would just lay around the house and watch tv all day because i always felt real sick to my stomach and even tho i was lazier and ate more i still lost 5 pounds, and my doctor told me that was normal so dont stress out about it.

I wish that was the way it worked not pregnant lol. Im extremely lazy to. My boyfriend wanted me to quit my job because he doesn't want me lifting anything..so I sleep..eat..watch Netflix and pee...a lot
hahaha lord you sound like me! cept im sleep, xbox, netflix, and peeing, and a whole lot of eating. lol.

It is normal to lose weight ESP if (no offense cause.IDK your body build) you're over weight. Its healthy even, surprising I know. My MIL lost 75lbs with my SIL and she very obese, I've seen pics. A lot of Drs recommend it so that you don't become even more over weight and so you don't develop geatational diabetes. If your Dr doesn't seem concerned then its all good! As long as baby is growing healthy then its fine, I mean just don't starve your self Haha cause THATS not good! congratulations on the pregnancy Hun!!!

I have lost 14 pounds this pregnancy,  and probably ten my first. I call it the pregnancy diet. Lol. I looked better after my first baby than before. My baby is healthy. Not sure how it works but for some it does. Congrats.

question: before I got pregnant I was a steady 195. I always wanted to be skinnier, but didn't really try for it. I started gaining alot of weight when I found out I was pregnant. At 5 weeks I was 201 I was upset but my doctor said it was ok. So today I went to check up on things and sign up for wic. Then they told me I was. 193 pounds I am 8 Weeks now...i lost weight ? I haven't had any throwing up..and I've been eating everything o.o little confused..
title: I lost weight?!
